question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. tv
B. fireplace
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The fireplace is clearly positioned further back in the room, behind the TV, and is the central focal point of the background, while the TV is on the left side and closer to the foreground.
